N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7870.2 - Distributor records

State Regulations
(a) On or
before November first, yearly, and for new customers at the time an account is
established, all distributors shall contact their customers in any convenient
manner and ask whether the customer wishes to designate a relative or other
person, or a social services agency, to receive notification of a cutoff, in
addition to any notification provided to the customer. (b) Every distributor shall maintain records
of the information provided by customers under this requirement. Notes
